title: Its just unnatural...

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Please, I'm begging 
Change back the magic shield colour...

for the love of all thats holy, those shades of green and... pink?
were not meant to be together!

They are almost the same tone, which means that its hard for the eye to see them as seperate, (theres a less definitive line between the green and pink.)
Not only is it hard on the eye and harder to see, but it's just straight up hideous... sorry :S

_____

Where it becomes an actual in-game problem though is when you use colour-blind mode.
I personally don't use colour-blind, but i know plenty of people who do (many who aren't colour blind).

But look at the picture, in a team fight where you can only briefly glance at your HP bar out of the corner of your eye, while you're focusing on the rest of the battle. You just will not see how much of a shield you have... full stop.

And that could be disastrous, jumping into battle, assuming you have a shield, when actually its gone but you just cant see the difference.
(Clarity.)

I played a training mode game, and gave myself max HP, so I had a 500ish magic shield on colour-blind mode, and it was practically invisible.
Thats a 500 damage shield that you have no idea is there.

Please. 
There was nothing wrong with the deep purple it was before, it was easy to see on all kinds of HP bars, and purple is a much more 'magic' colour than a lightly bleached shade of pink.


_PS. why was it even changed? The patch notes gave no explanation._
